notifications.nothingToPaste: Nothing to paste. Copy an item first.

ai.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your assistant for creating medical diagrams. How can I help you today?

quickActions.findIconsPrompt: What type of icon are you looking for?
quickActions.diagramIdeasPrompt: What type of medical diagram would you like to create?
quickActions.improveDesignPrompt: How can I improve my current diagram?

responses.howToCreate: To create a diagram, you can drag icons from the sidebar to the canvas, add arrows to connect elements, and use text for labels. I can suggest specific icons if you tell me what type of diagram you're creating!
responses.cellSuggestion: I found some cell icons that might be useful for your diagram:
responses.virusSuggestion: Here are some viruses you can use in your diagram:
responses.antibodySuggestion: I found icons related to antibodies and immunology:
responses.anatomySuggestion: Here are anatomical structures that might be useful:
responses.iconSearch: I found {{count}} icons related to your search:
responses.defaultHelp: I can help you find specific icons, create medical diagrams, or give suggestions on how to improve your design. What kind of help do you need?
responses.iconAdded: {{name}} has been added to your diagram!
